articles.title: Museum to fix 'ripples' in Rembrandt's 'Night Watch' - Associated Press
articles.description: THE HAGUE, Netherlands (AP) — Rembrandt van Rijn's iconic painting “The Night Watch” will be restretched to get rid of deformations in its top left corner, the Netherlands’ national museum announced Wednesday.
